reviews.review: Great game for when you're bored!

Game very much was pleasant to me as well as single game, and a multiplayer. I advise all to fans to think over. All game on logic and mind. In single game I liked a plot, it well continues a plot of the first part. And in a multiplayer well develops in itself a team game, and it is so possible to have fun simply with the friend (Bubble_Gum [RUSская]) approves)))). I recommend to all, won't regret! ! !  (This my opinion and it can not coincide with yours).

After finishing Portal, I thought all the fun was over in terms of pissfarting around. When I bought Portal 2 for $5 (I had a coupon), I thought maybe it still was possible. I found the levels were considerably harder than the first one's, and the storyline was much longer, and somehow a tad more humerous. The introduction of different features, and new multiplayer support really amazed me. Even though I bought it for a quarter of its price, I still think it would be worth the $20. Plus it has controller support, so that's cool.
A éssayer de toute urgence. Un jeu de reflexion avec une bonne touche d'humour. Encore meilleur en coopération.
Jeu très sympa, dont le mode solo contient un très bon contenu, jeu recommandé pour ceux qui aiment les casse-têtes ou bien qui jouent pour l'histoire d'un jeu ! :D

good game, story continues nicely from Portal to Portal 2, the story will keep you on guessing what will happen next

Portal 2 no es sólo un juego donde tienes que realizar rompecabezas, si no que en su historia esconde un gran misterio, te hace ir de un sentido futurista a uno "pasado-futurista". Lo recomiendo totalmente, único en su género y maravilloso.
Bello fluido e impegnativo un buon passatempo .
My favorite game in the world, it combines a compelling story with puzzles seamlessly. Not to mention that the visuals are fantastic too. Great job valve.

Продолжение развивает игровой процесс первой игры, состоящий из головоломок, построенных на использовании специального устройства для создания порталов — разрывов в пространстве — позволяющих игроку мгновенно перемещаться из одного места в другое. Среди множества нововведений геймплея в Portal 2 присутствует кооперативный режим для прохождения двумя игроками. Действие игры происходит спустя некоторое время после событий Portal в разрушенной и заброшенной Лаборатории исследования природы порталов (Aperture Science) и фокусируется на дальнейшем противостоянии всё той же главной героини, подопытной девушки Челл, и маниакального суперкомпьютера GLaDOS. В кооперативном режиме присутствует отдельная сюжетная линия.
portal 2 and portal are probbebly the most played game apart from half life 1 and 2 valve if you do read this please release portal 3

まぁまぁ面白かった。パズルの内容は前回よりも少し簡単になったと思う。二作目だからといって難易度を上げすぎないのも作り手のセンスかなと思ったりもします。ゲーム事態は1をやってれば12時間くらいでクリアできました。ストーリーは二転三転する作りでよかったです。人が作ったパズルも出来るみたいなんですが極悪難易度が用意されてるっぽくて怖くてやってません

The game is actually pretty old, although people still play the game, because it is really well-influenced if you ask me! It has a really lot of great things and there is so much to be discovered... Especially in the 2nd episode of the game (which I am right now reviewing) is really exciting, because first of all it is a valve made game and we all know that valve games are AWESOME and secondly, a lot of new features have been addad, such as multiplayer, more easter eggs about the whole storyline of the game and you can even publish your own maps now! I have played a lot of valve games but just the inspired of the portal gun makes me and all the other portal (2) fans still play the game. Show some love to this good old game of valve and who knows... they might make another episode of it after all (of course they will not since they have not even done that for HL2 :P )!

VEry good and inovative gameplay! Even better than the first one, the lifetime of the game has also greatly been increased in comparision to the 3 hours it took to complete the original one.

Superior to the original in every way, shape, and form. Not to say that the original was bad. The original was great! But this sequel expands upon it even more.

The graphics are updated, but that is to be expected. The background music is interesting (though the credits song was not as good as Still Alive--tough to top it). The sound effects are all great, including the dialog, which is of course probably the best thing of the game besides the puzzles themselves. The game is a lot longer than the first game and the newer styles of puzzles add much more variety to the game. The story of Aperture is expanded upon with much more background, and the ending cinematic is probably one of my favorites of all time.

Portal 2 is a blast, and unless you absolutely hated the first game (which would be crazy), you should play this game no matter what!

Stephen Merchant is hilarious and everybody should know it, this game is unexpectedly long and really impressive in terms of scale, witty and mind boggling at times, Portal 2 is a must for everybody ever
Fantastic game. 10/10 moon points.

Half-life 2: Episode Portal is a sorry excuse for a video game. Come on valve, you never fail to dissapoint. Serioulsy, Portal 2 is the salt and vinegar potato chip of video games. I've fought mudcrabs more fearsome than this peice of crap, poorly designed, unicorn blood, pansie wansie, shit-tier, life-sucking waste of time. If you play this game, you will miss every fun oportunity in life and DIE ANGRY. I'm warning you right now, as a friend- stay the fuck away from this cursed jumble of outdated source-engine coding.

Milk Stats:
-Character Design: Our protagonist, Gordon Freeman, is a very deep character. He has complex dialouge and an incredibly rich backstory. Unfortunately, this backstory can only be found on the wiki and the game has hardly any story at all. 10/10
-Graphics: They're shit heh heh 6/10
-Adlult Content Rating: I've played better H-games, but it's not bad 1/10 it's shit.
-Community: Automatched partners are all retarded. Puzzlues impossible 10/10
-Sound: No music. No sfx. No balls.
-Puzzle: It's puzzling why was released ZING!
-Spiderman Graphics: The symbiote suit looks good, regular suit needs another MegaByte or two. 6/10

And now for the moment you've all been waiting for, my final midterm report!
Stay away at all costs. Gaben, give us what we really want and release Half-Life 3
Final Grade: 10 gravity guns/12 gravity guns
It's great!  Other than it being extremely fun, it gives more insight into the story behind Aperture Science.
Sûrement l'un des meilleurs jeux que j'ai acheté, je le recommande vraiment !
Y'all should take a break from Bioshock Infinite, Borderlands 2, and Garry's Mod, and just play some EPIC Portal 2!

Portal 2 - это безусловно оригинальный проект, отличные головоломки, невероятный сюжет и неповторимые эмоции. Проще говоря, игра оставляет положительное мнение, но к сожалению, даже и у этой игры есть свои минусы. Например однотипные локации, особенно в начале игры, которые сильно надоедают, затем сильно частые загрузки и иной раз обидные фразы в человеческую сущность, хотя не секрет, что в этих фразах присутствует не мало правды. И всё таки это просто мелочи по сравнению со впечатлениями, которые оставляет после себя Portal 2. Это действительно, на редкость, уникальная игра, которая одновременно развлекает, заставляет думать, заряжает небольшим адреналином и огромным позитивом. 
Моя оценка: ★★★★ (4.5 из 5)
Quite simply, one of the very best games of all time - with a fantastic sense of humour.
Extrem humorvolles und gutes Spiel.

This is a great game, especially if you play it with a friend. Sending each other flying through portals aimed a wall is extremely fun and satisfying. Working together to solve complex problems with your portals is even more satisfying. Beware this game is not easy and if you intend to look up solutions, you will ruin the game for yourself. People who enjoy puzzle and complex games should really enjoy this.

The impressive sequel to Portal is bigger, better, and contains more laughs as it successfully advances the “comedy” genre of video games. The puzzle-based gameplay is fun, but becomes less interesting on replay, like the first Portal. The multiplayer levels are fun to play through with a friend.

Encore meilleur que son grand frère de par sa longueur et ses ajouts qui brillent d'un humour et d'une personalité inoubliable ou par leur intelligence surprenante, Portal 2 est pour moi l'un de ces quelques jeux qui transcendent leur support et deviennent… des œuvres.

Portal 2 is the new great sequel to the newest concept of puzzle games. Using 2 kind of portals named "Blue" and "Orange" portals.

This game is great it brings the game to a whole new level partly because the concept of puzzle game has been scrambled up with a shooter to make it look so confusing it's awesome.



Puzzle games used to be pushing buttons and activating or interacting with objects. Portal 2 tries it's best to maintain this elements gamers still love but with a twist. Old puzzles usually require pushing objects or standing on them. Portal uses a "Portal Gun" to shoot out portals so you can jump into the blue and coming out of the orange.



The nonsense you get from playing Multiplayer is insanely fun. The things you guys can do may not be as straight forward as you think it would be. Preferable playing it with a friend that is willing to create mischief because as the objective maybe getting an object to stand on a platform. You could sabotage your friend and confusing him which makes it so intriguing to do it.
